attributes.title: 2022 Hyundai i20 1.2 Fluid

attributes.description: Plush, Rich And Luxurious. The Stunning V6 Porsche Macan Diesel S Is A Sportscar That Will Impress. Our 2014 Model Is Beautifully Appointed In A Dark Blue Metallic That Is A Very Rare Colour In South Africa. It Has A Black Leather Interior And Gloss Black Interior Trim With Red Accents. This Vehicle Has Covered Only 117 000 km And Retains A Full Service History, All Books And Spare Keys. Condition: Excellent – No Dents Or Major Scratches/Marks On Paintwork, 4 Michelin Tyres, No Oil Leaks, No Curb Rash On Wheels, No Tears In Leather. Features Include Front And Rear Park Distance Control, Reverse Camera With Park Assist, Bi Xenon Lights With PDLS(Porsche Dynamic Lighting System), PASM, Sport Chrono Package, EGR Software + Swirl Flap Delete, DPF Removal (Stainless Steel Downpipe), Full Detail With Ceramic Coating Done In April 2022, Stainless Steel Skid Plates Front And Rear, Dashboard Covered In Leather With Stunning Red Accents, Porsche Crest On Front Headrests,  Multi Functional Steering Wheel With Paddle Shift, Bluetooth, USB And Auxiliary Input, Electric Seats, 3 Zone Climate Control,  Anti Smash And Grab Window Tint And 20 Inch Genuine Porsche RS Spyder Wheels With Colour Centre Caps. This Superb Vehicle Is Good Looking, Comfortable And Very Fuel Efficient. It Can Be Yours Now! Call Us Today. Swift Finance Can Be Arranged. Trade Ins Of Good Condition Accepted. For More Information Contact Chris 083 34 01 011, Vasco 082 87 95 205, Manni 083 22 77 294, Thulie 083 24 33 243 Or Fuzzy 083 21 46 572.

attributes.description: Finance is available with all the major banks as we are approved dealers. Please come and visit our Used Car Manager and our Business Manager, they will be able to arrange a Taylor made Deal structure to match your pocket over a lovely cup of coffee at our Bistro. Trade-ins welcome and we pay top prices for good clean vehicles. First time to finance, our Finance and Insurance Manager will assist you step by step throughout your process. There are great warranty options available for this vehicle and other great products. Should you require further information or you would like to arrange a test drive please do not hesitate to contact us at Motus Toyota Bedfordview.
